## Vector3.(constructor)

Creates a new Vector3 initialized with values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(x: number, y: number, z: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The x component. |
|  y | number | The y component. |
|  z | number | The z component. |
